column4: as you can tell from nickrud 's reaction , PriceChild  can't realy help anyone
just ask a specific question on one line
do you mean hard drive or something else iwth hd for an initial &
a hard drive, is a seagate st340810a
is this your primary hdd with ubuntu installed on it or a storage drive
he is what a call "my important data disc" he is not running ubuntu, the ubuntu is in another drive
i just usehim to save my projects,my musics and my porns uhaHUAhua
what FS is this disk ?
a FAT32
english is not my native language, are you understanding me fine?

I think we found the culprite , fat32 is not all that fast,  you might do better with ext3,  also you might want to consider defragmenting it , not sure how from ubuntu how ever,  if you still hve windows installed on your comp, I suggest you do it from there
ubotu  is a bot,  he just does what we tell it
how he know the language i speak? Oo
he doesn'T checked your whois before triggering the msg
ah sure , lol
you are from US?
no , from canada
hum, my english is very bad? :D
your english is fine,but you mention it wasn't your first language so I checked to see if we had a channel in your language I could direct you to
thank you, now i will sleep a bit,wake and take a beer, and later i will be back to the work,im so tired of this computer ¬¬
rest well
